message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $13,000 is already a very competitive price for this product considering its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
